entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
